alert.note: Alert for Grant; Natchitoches; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 3:37PM CDT until September 07 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Grant Parish in north central Louisiana... East central Natchitoches Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southwestern Winn Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 336 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles east of Montgomery, or 13 miles south of Winnfield, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Colfax, Montgomery, Atlanta, Melrose, Lake Iatt, Aloha and Williana. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
